page.title: 05ASPECTS OF EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: Most residents of the area have to go outside for employment but several places employ local labour in small ways. Farmers employ labour to harvest crops and tend cattle. Both the Swan and Red Lion hostelries employ bar staff, waiters and kitchen staff for catering. Pipers Pet Foods find work for some, either caring for dogs or selling petfoods to the public. Hashmead tree nursery in Salford keep a small workforce to tend trees and machinery. The animal sanctuary at Glebe Farm off Aspley Lane have workers to feed,exercise and clean animals' living quarters. Some households employ people daily as domestic workers, general gardeners and handymen.
